docs.snippet: Roger Ebert, the popular film critic and television co-host, could lift or sink the fortunes of a movie along with his partner, Gene Siskel....
docs.lead_paragraph: Roger Ebert, the popular film critic and television co-host, could lift or sink the fortunes of a movie along with his partner, Gene Siskel.
docs.abstract: Roger Ebert, popular film critic who along with fellow reviewer Gene Siskel could lift or sink a film's fortunes, dies at age 70; was best-known reviewer of his generation, and one of most trusted; force and grace of his opinions propelled film criticism into mainstream of American culture; worked at Chicago Sun-Times for over 40 years.

headline.seo: Roger Ebert, Movie Critic of the Mainstream, Dies at 70
headline.main: Roger Ebert Dies at 70; a Critic for the Common Man
headline.print_headline: A Critic for the Common Man
